__e: Mom and Dad live happily ever after and Sam and I grow up playing Little League and chasing tail?
We can't find somebody who has never picked up a baseball and teach them how to pitch.
We did it to show that everyone should be allowed to play baseball and have fun.
But if it does work and you take two kids from the middle of India who've never picked up a baseball in their lives and turn them into Major League prospects in one year...
And even baseball's changed from when my dad was growing up.
Wait, I haven't played baseball for years.
I mean, I used to play baseball in college.
If you played baseball, you'd be better than Mantle, Mays, and Clement together.
